title: just lost a game to riot games coding.
body:
3 times as a riven vs renek lane(hardest lane she has) , got stuck in creeps 4 times and died 3 of those times. thank god THANK GOD i had to control my anger. all he had to do was aa me to death and i COULDNT flash because i HAD TO USE IT BEFORE DUE TO CREEP BLOCK AGAIN

my own creeps got me killed. MY OWN C R E E P S.

YOU CANT TRUST ANYONEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
give me my lp thanks.

bot and mid lost solo i lost cuz of coding.

d3 promos 1 loss now.
godbless riot.

replies.body:
So instead of just accepting that you got trashed in lane due to not paying attention to the wave, you blame the game code.

There is an entire subreddit for denialist riven players, nobody here cares.
holy fuck lol. even the renek said "unlucky luL" all 3 times. all you wanna do is blame it on me maining riven

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xyUBklzl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-23T18:55:54.344+0000)
>
> So instead of just accepting that you got trashed in lane due to not paying attention to the wave, you blame the game code.
> 
> There is an entire subreddit for denialist riven players, nobody here cares.

https://cdn.meme.am/instances/400x/54915336.jpg
You didn't learn the first 3 times that standing in the middle of minions affects movement? Usually when I die more than twice to something like that I catch on to it and change my strategy.
are u in denial that much? do you refuse to admit creep block fucks people over? strategy? not going to lane? waiting until no minions are in the lane to go in?

Replay please?

Also, if many people are complaining about creepblock Riot should add Ghosting Boots: 
T2 boot, made from T1 boot+800g, gives +45 MS, and a {{summoner:6}} passive.

> [{quoted}](name=Awesomedude8888,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xyUBklzl,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-23T20:55:21.839+0000)
>
> Replay please?
> 
> Also, if many people are complaining about creepblock Riot should add Ghosting Boots: 
> T2 boot, made from T1 boot+800g, gives +45 MS, and a {{summoner:6}} passive.

You should post this on C&C lol, it might be seen by a Rioter
I will do that if enough people get creepblocked.
i dont have replay.gg on that acc but you can check the history and see how i died. i dont think you're gonna ntoice creep block like that howveer. acc name is azureraven
